glsa.title: Imlib2: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been discovered in Imlib2.

background.p: Imlib2 is replacement library from the Enlightenment project for libraries like libXpm.

description.p: Julien Danjou reported a pointer arithmetic error and a heap-based buffer overflow within the load() function of the XPM image loader.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to process a specially crafted XPM image, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application, or a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
